definedIn._instruction: Add one or several files in which this parcellation terminology version is stored in.

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name for this parcellation terminology version.

hasEntityVersion._instruction: Add all parcellation entity versions which belong to this parcellation terminology version.

isAlternativeVersionOf._instruction: Add one or several alternative versions to this parcellation terminology version.

isNewVersionOf._instruction: Add the earlier version of this parcellation terminology version.

ontologyIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier(s) (IRI) of the related ontological term(s) matching this parcellation terminology version.

shortName._instruction: Enter a descriptive short name for this parcellation terminology version.

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this parcellation terminology version.

versionInnovation._instruction: Enter a short description of the novelties/peculiarities of this parcellation terminology version.
